select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, replycnt, readCnt, type from ( select rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, replycnt, readCnt, type from ( select * from ( select * from movie_board where deleted = 'N' UNION ALL select * from game_board where deleted = 'N' UNION ALL select * from book_board where deleted = 'N' UNION ALL select * from etc_board where deleted = 'N' ) all_boards order by regdate desc ) where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from ( select * from movie_board where deleted = 'N' UNION ALL select * from game_board where deleted = 'N' UNION ALL select * from book_board where deleted = 'N' UNION ALL select * from etc_board where deleted = 'N' ) where
bno > 0
